attraction_reviewComments: I loved this park and good for the couple. I recommend for visit here at the evening. It has awesome playgrounds for kids. So perfect small family outing.
Absolutely love this park! Every time I go to LA, I need to go there! Love the atmosphere and the neighborhood! Great for family, friends and couples!
